options.D: AI is a reflection of humanity and its creations throughout history.

189.question: What is the implication of AI being a 'reflection of humanity,' according to the speaker?

options.A: AI will always be limited by human flaws.
options.B: AI is fundamentally separate from human values.
options.D: We must ensure AI embodies the best aspects of humanity.
